articles.title: Macron warns the West could lose credibility over Ukraine and Gaza wars - BBC
articles.description: The French president spoke at the Shangri-la Dialogue, a high-level Asia defence summit in Singapore.
articles.content:
Tessa WongReporting from
Shangri-la Dialogue, Singapore
Macron was speaking at the Shangri-la Dialogue in Singapore
France's President Emmanuel Macron warned the US and Europe risked losing their … [+6690 chars]
